title: Which is better, FL Studio 20 or Acid Pro 9? - Quora

response.answer_text: Fruity loops is the best DAW i’ve ever used or seen so far. The only thing better might be to have your own keyboards synthesizers and drum machines effects processors and a good mixing board. This could run you into thousands if not tens of thousand of dollars. And there’s a lot you still wouldn’t be able to do with that.(some people use this equipment along with Sony’s “pro tools” and sony jamtrax from what i hear. I’ve never used pro tools or jam trax.) Fruity loops emulates these things and places them all in a small and relatively easy to use software. (It helps to have a good computer and sound card to run it). Acid is mostly about layering and mixing premade .wav files. Songs like those made by ‘the prodigy’… ‘smack my bitch up’ for example, have been made in daws similar to ‘acid’ …well actually ableton which is similar to acid.  Other songs like ‘animals’ by martin garrix, were made in fruity loops.
